#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		a=a % s.length();
		b=b % s.length();
		if(a==0)
		a=s.length();
		if(b==0)
		b=s.length();
		if(s[a-1]==s[b-1])
		cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
